title: Associate DataHub
description: Are you looking to build your first Boomi DataHub solution? Take this course to gain the needed skills and knowledge.

paragraphs: This course is geared for Boomi users who are familiar with data management concepts, and looking to build their first Boomi DataHub solution. It covers the foundational knowledge needed to implement data management with DataHub. You will learn how to set up a basic solution in order to synchronize and enrich trusted data across all systems within your organization. The course activities provide practice in modeling a data domain; configuring model structure, sources, and rules; deploying your model to a repository; using the Boomi DataHub connector to synchronize data across sources; and managing data quality through reporting, quarantine, and filter functions.
Note: This course covers the latest Boomi DataHub connector. If you are using the “Boomi Master Data Hub (Legacy)” connector, it will not match the content in this course.
Objectives

There are five sections of this course, presented in the recommended order of completion. You may access the content in the order that supports your learning. However, the activities will only work if completed in the order presented. Please also note the course activities build on those completed in Integration Essentials. Please complete Integration Essentials first to prepare for this course’s activities.

Recommended Prerequisites
Getting Started with the Boomi Platform
Integration Essentials
DataHub Essentials
The Boomi Enterprise Platform is updated regularly to enhance functionality and user experience. Some images and details in this training may differ from how they appear in the Boomi platform.

Define a model of the data and parameters that will be loaded into DataHub.

title: API Control Plane
description: Do you have API Sprawl or Zombie APIs? The Boomi API Control Plane course will teach you how to resolve these issues and allows you implement a secure, Federated API Management with Governance.

paragraphs: In this course, you will explore how the Boomi API Control Plane acts as a central hub for designing, publishing, documenting, and managing APIs throughout their entire lifecycle. The target audience is API Management professionals with experience in API Design and Management. You will learn about API Governance, Security, Monitoring, and Versioning, ensuring that your APIs are not only productive but also secure and compliant with organizational standards.  You can tackle API sprawl — the unmanaged proliferation of APIs across an organization — and can implement a robust API Governance and increase the Security.

By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the insights and expertise to configure the API Control Plane, register API Cloud Environments, discover APIs, create API Products, create Applications for API Subscriptions and visualize API traffic and usage via Dashboards.

Professional API Management
